result.title: Codeforces new Tool
result.content:
Hi everyone!
Recently codeforces has a new tool!
In user profiles in front of contest rating you can see the maximum rating of user!
In parenthesis is written : (max. TITLE, RATING)
And also in the chart that point is shown with a red circle around of it.
Thanks to MikeMirzayanov ans his growing system.
What's your idea about this? Is this new tool useful?
